fields.summary: Incorrect results when hive.optimize.index.filter=true and same ORC table is referenced twice in query

comments.body: [~gopalv]: I only tested with MRv2. Not sure about other execution engines but I will test.

Same issue, even with explicit aliases:
{noformat}
hive (default)> set hive.optimize.index.filter=true;
hive (default)> select * from test_table x where number = 1
              > union all
              > select * from test_table y where number = 2;
